gate.creole.measurements

Class MeasurementsParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.creole.measurements.MeasurementsParser

  • public class MeasurementsParser
extends Object
    A measurement parser based upon a modified version of the Java port of the GNU Units package.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • MeasurementsParser

        public MeasurementsParser(URL data,
                          URL common)
                   throws IOException
        Construct an instance of the parser. Use sdefault values for encoding and locale of UTF-8 and en_GB respectively. The main configuration file should be in the same format as that accepted by the GNU Units package. The common words file is a simple list of one unit per line. Units which appear in the common word file will not be recognised if they appear on their own but will be used in measurements with a compound unit. This file was manually tuned over a large corpus of patent documents but may need to be edited for specific domains.
        Parameters:
        data - the URL of the main data file
        common - the URL of the common words file
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs loading data from the specified configuration files
        See Also:
        MeasurementsParser(String, String, URL, URL), Format of the GNU Units data file

      • MeasurementsParser

        public MeasurementsParser(String encoding,
                          String locale,
                          URL data,
                          URL common)
                   throws IOException
        Construct an instance of the parser. The main configuration file should be in the same format as that accepted by the GNU Units package. The common words file is a simple list of one unit per line. Units which appear in the common word file will not be recognised if they appear on their own but will be used in measurements with a compound unit. This file was manually tuned over a large corpus of patent documents but may need to be edited for specific domains.
        Parameters:
        encoding - the encoding of the two configuration files
        locale - the locale to use for parsing measurements
        data - the URL of the main data file
        common - the URL of the common words file
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs loading data from the specified configuration files
        See Also:
        Format of the GNU Units data file

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public Measurement parse(double amount,
                         String text)
        Attempt to parse the string as a unit, using the provided double as the amount of the unit in the returned measurement. Parsing does not have to consume the entire string in order for a measurement to be found and returned. Parsing will start from the beginning of the string.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount of the unit in the measurement
        text - the text to parse
        Returns:
        a measurement if one is found, null otherwise

      • parse

        public Measurement parse(double amount,
                         String text,
                         int index)
        Attempt to parse the string as a unit, using the provided double as the amount of the unit in the returned measurement. Parsing does not have to consume the entire string in order for a measurement to be found and returned.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount of the unit in the measurement
        text - the text to parse
        index - the index within the text to start parsing from
        Returns:
        a measurement if one is found, null otherwise

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws MalformedURLException,
                        IOException
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException
        IOException
